capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm a huge fan of Professor McGonagall. She's an amazing teacher and an incredible witch in her own right. I've always admired her dedication to the Hogwarts community and her unwavering commitment to fighting against darkness and evil. As someone who values fairness, justice, and compassion, I think she's one of the most inspiring figures in the wizarding world.

You know, I've always had a lot of respect for Professor McGonagall. She's an amazing witch and an incredible educator. I mean, she was the Transfiguration professor here at Hogwarts for many years, and she's just so dedicated to her students. I think that's part of why she's so well-liked by everyone in the school.
capsules_submitted.reply: valeria, i think i trust you.

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always had a lot of respect for Professor McGonagall. She's an amazing educator and a fierce protector of her students. I think that's one of the reasons why she's such a beloved figure among the students - she genuinely cares about each and every one of us.
